original_title: Grigory Sokolov - Live at the Berlin Philharmonie - Schubert & Beethoven
overview: "Probably the best living pianist" headlined the Berliner Morgenpost's review of Grigory Sokolov's sold-out June 2013 recital at the Berlin Philharmonie. "The four Impromptus could no be interpreted more dramatically... The D 946 Pieces cried out with despair an longing for death." (from DVD cover)
title: Grigory Sokolov - Live at the Berlin Philharmonie - Schubert & Beethoven
